name: Throwboat
description:
A mysterious enemy made everyone in your viking village fall asleep and steal all women and weapons. Jump on your viking boat and throwback the attacks from your enemies with the help of a magic shield!

A game by Demotivated Pixels: John Anthony, Joan Orantos, Leif-Julian Øvrelid, Renato Grottesi

Source code at https://github.com/renato-grottesi/throwboat

Try the Android version from Google Play https://goo.gl/CTh98r
